cab.content: s a C fi E T..G.T.-1162W&a CABIKBI,(G.T.013).I sm informed by Mr. Boner Law^ Seorotary that theChancellor of the Exchequer summoned a meeting on the 3rd instant, at which Sir Albert Stanley, Sir L. -/orthingtonSvcns sod Mr. Montagu wore present, to discuss the Uon-FerrousMetal Bill.It was decided to recommend to the Cabinet that the Billshould not be proceeded with.(Signed) M.P.A.JMKEY.Secretary, war Cabinet.2 Whitehall Gardens,26th June, 1917.
